name: security_summary
description: Template for generating security scan summaries with structured output
template:
Analyze the following security scan results and provide a comprehensive summary:

Scan Data:
{scan_data}

Context:
{context}

Please provide:
1. Executive Summary (2-3 sentences)
2. Key Findings (bullet points)
3. Risk Assessment (High/Medium/Low with justification)
4. Recommendations (numbered list)

Format your response as a structured JSON object with keys: executive_summary, key_findings, risk_assessment, recommendations.
